content.html: Bloody depressing @thismorning phone-in again. So many people at crisis point regarding energy bills - including those with v high usage due to disabilities (home ventilators, oxygen concentrators, elec wheel chairs etc). I am nearly OUT OF TOOLS to help Govt must intervene
content.value:
Bloody depressing @thismorning phone-in again.  So many people at crisis point regarding energy bills - including those with v high usage due to disabilities (home ventilators, oxygen concentrators, elec wheel chairs etc).  

I am nearly OUT OF TOOLS to help

Govt must intervene
